########################################
#
# CMake file for Python wrapper:_Siren
#
########################################

# Third Party dependencies of this module
include_directories( ${BOOST_INCLUDE_DIR}
                     ${PYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR} )

# Sire include paths
include_directories( BEFORE ${SIRE_INCLUDE_DIR}/Siren
                            ${SIRE_INCLUDE_DIR} )

# Other python wrapping directories
include_directories(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR})

# Get the list of autogenerated files
include(CMakeAutogenFile.txt)

# Define the sources in Siren
set ( WRAPSIREN_SOURCES

      _Siren.main.cpp

      wrap_exceptions.cpp
     
      ${PYPP_SOURCES}

    )

# Create the library that holds all of the class wrappers
add_library (Siren ${WRAPSIREN_SOURCES})

set_target_properties (Siren
                       PROPERTIES
                         VERSION ${SIRE_VERSION}
                         SOVERSION ${SIRE_VERSION_MAJOR}
                         OUTPUT_NAME "Siren"
                         PREFIX "_"
                         SUFFIX ${PYTHON_MODULE_EXTENSION}
		       )
		       
target_link_libraries (Siren
                       SIRE_Siren
                       ${BOOST_PYTHON_LIBRARY}
                       ${PYTHON_LIBRARIES}
                      )

# installation
set( INSTALLDIR ${SIRE_PYTHON}/Sire/Siren )

install( TARGETS Siren
         LIBRARY DESTINATION ${INSTALLDIR}
       )

install( FILES __init__.py
         DESTINATION ${INSTALLDIR} 
       )
